effect.black-white: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.black-2-white-2: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

short_effect.black-white: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.
short_effect.black-2-white-2: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

flavor_text.black-white: A reckless, life-risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.
